archimate:ImplementationEvent.name: 17.11.2023 - Reported status to CISO, Head of Security & Compliance, Head of Data Platform Services
archimate:ImplementationEvent.documentation:
Sami Aura and Mattias Dahlberg structured the output from the audit, "ISAE4302 2023 - Preliminary results Tietoevry Tech Services 20231113 - v1.0.pdf" and "Tietoevry ISAE Control Catalogue 2023 v1.8.xlsx" into "ISAE3402 results and Control Catalogue.xlsx".
Owen Richardson reported the current status to the: • CISO (Mikael Lingskog) • the Head of Security & Compliance (Mikaela Kemppi) • and the Head of Data Platform Services (Aki Liimatta).
